title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions: Introducing the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard! Get ready to elevate your gaming experience with the perfect combination of tactile click and smooth membrane in our hybrid blue switch technology. The aircraft-grade aluminum alloy frame ensures durability and reliability, while the OLED smart display provides customizable gifs, game info, and even displays discord messages. With dynamic per-key RGB illumination and a premium magnetic wrist rest for full palm support and comfort, this keyboard is perfect for both gaming and general use. Compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 is the ultimate choice for serious gamers. Upgrade your setup and take your gaming to the next level with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard.

Experience next-level gaming with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard. Featuring a hybrid mechanical switch that combines the tactile click of a blue switch with the smooth membrane, you'll enjoy the best of both worlds. The OLED smart display allows for customizable gifs, game info, and Discord messages, while the per-key RGB illumination adds a stunning visual element to your gaming setup. Made with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, this keyboard is built to last. The premium magnetic wrist rest provides full palm support and unparalleled comfort. With IP32 water resistance and compatibility with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, this keyboard is perfect for both gaming and general use. Elevate your gaming experience with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5.

Crafted with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, this keyboard is built to last and withstand the rigors of intense gaming sessions. Compatible with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation, this keyboard is perfect for gaming and general use. With IP32 water resistance, it's also designed to withstand accidental spills and splashes.
